title: Kargo - Dreams of Marrakesh [FLAC]
description:
Join Kargo as they chart their travels through the captivating land of Morocco. Experience the night time delights as you find yourself in the heart of Marrakesh's world famous marketplace. Inspired by Moroccan music and culture, we discover a stunning album of traditional sounds and rhythms fused with modern styles and techniques. Guitars, Piano and Keyboards are masterfully backed by the authentic percussion of Djembe, Darbouka, Bongo and Hand Drums. the result is a 21st Century musical guide to this mystical and charming location.
